item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (336 points | 69 comments)
2. Dawn of a new era in Search: Balancing innovation, competition, and public good (27 points | discuss)
3. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (682 points | 241 comments)

8. MindsDB (YC W20) Is Hiring ( | hide)

14. Judge Rules $400M Algorithmic System Illegally Denied People's Medicaid Benefits (33 points | discuss)

23. Air Con: $1697 for an on/off switch (1619 points | 410 comments)

25. Farewell Pandas, and thanks for all the fish (152 points | 94 comments)
26. UK rail minister got engineer sacked for raising safety concerns (407 points | 207 comments)
27. Japan's Real First Console? Bandai's TV Jack 5000 (31 points | 6 comments)

29. Two Dots Too Many (2008) (61 points | 25 comments)
30. Low Cost Mini PCs (478 points | 225 comments)
